description:
You are in the dashboard.
Login via [bookingflix.com/en/sign-in.html](https://bookingflix.com/net/sign-in.html)

1. Click on ***Edit system mails***. You can find this link under the top menu item ***Settings***.
2. Select the desired appointment booking calendar.
3. Select which email notification you want to edit: Confirmation, Cancellation or Verification.
4. In the editing window, you can customize the text.
5. Add the existing variables, if needed. These will generate automatically from the form fields of the created form.

Below the editing window you can see the preview.

After editing, do not forget to save. You can find the button below the preview.
title: Edit email texts
